Articles.Content:
From the creators of the SAL Atmospheric Jets, I present to you, the most stable jet we've ever created, the One Seater (OS) Trainer Atmospheric Jet! Designed with the common plane n00b in mind, it was designed to be a stable platform to fly and have fun on, while also being a sleek, fast jet able to cut through the air at a top speed of 150m/s!

With a fairly low partcount, the OS Trainer Jet is able to be flown on nearly any computer and may be able to land on the wonderful aircraft carriers some of you have made.

With it's patent pending clipping technology, it is made using the most recent advances in both the NADI and NASI technology department. However, this plane was not made to launch missles () but only to be flown.

Much like the SAL Atmospheric Planes, the OS Jet rises very slowly but flies fairly fast compared to some other jets I've built.

.craft will be posted on request.
